sect1.title: SQL Commands
sect1.para: Produce an Appendix based on all of our output from SCAN re. ODBC Functions and ODBC Metadata calls implementations. This is important material that will actually help us. We should also do the same re. ODBC Scalar Functions and Escape syntax implementation.
Finally in scenarios were our behavior is different or configurable via the rule book this should be specified, all that is required is a CVS analysis of bug fixes relating to the ODBC APIs etc..
